package.name: Rapid
package.shortDescription: New shortcut widgets and shortcuts page inspired by iOS 14 aesthetics.

descriptionlist.description:
Rapid is not only aesthetically attractive, but also carries a functional load on the page of its widgets: - The iCloud access shortcut can be supplemented with its own avatar and name. - Set a timer to count down actions: until the screenshot is taken or until the phone is locked. - Set a shortcut to a specific page on Reddit or Twitter. - Provides information about your WiFi and cellular network; and on click transfers to their settings. - 6 free app shortcuts of your choice. - Music widget with a background image of the album cover, with animation in the form of waves while playing music. Shortcuts to the Music and Spotify applications. - Widget of access to the special editor "Showcase"
Introducing the Showcase Editor: - Adds a screenshot to the virtual phone frame of your choice. - Adds background image, text. - You can rotate the virtual phone image in 3D - Allows you to save your Showcase in a photo or directly to Twitter.
ATTENTION! - For iOS 13 only - For iPhone only (iPhone SE
